question: Match the causes with their logical results:

pairs.key: There was so much traffic on the road
pairs.value: It took hours to get to the beach
pairs.hint: Think about how traffic affects travel time.

pairs.value: We weren't able to find a good place to sit
pairs.hint: If there are too many people, you can't find a spot.
Temperature affects whether you can stay in the water.

pairs.value: The children were bitten all over

pairs.hint: Loud sounds often cause head pain.

pairs.key: We were all so tired in the evening
pairs.hint: What do you do immediately when you are exhausted?
